ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
var a = baseUrl.match(/\/book\/(.*?)\.html/);
let hrefList = [];
if (a) {
  var b = result.match(/data\-p\="\d+"/g).length;
  if (b) {
    for(let i = 1; i <= b; i++) {
      let href = `https://www.kelexs.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"body":"id=${a[1]}&page=${i}","method":"POST"}`;
      //java.log(href);
      hrefList.push(href);
    }
    hrefList
     }
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
function decode(){ let v43,v38,dest; // let date="Mobile "+Date.now(); let respose = java.get(baseUrl,{}); let accesskey = String(respose.header("accesskey")); let keyString = String(respose.header("keystring")); let content = String(respose.body()); let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length; let v9 =0; let v6 = String(accesskey[accesskeyLen-1]).charCodeAt(); for(i=0;i v18){ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,(v18-v15)+v15) }else{ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,v17+v15) } let v32 = content.length; if((v6 & 1)!=0){ v38 = content.substring(v32-12,v32) dest = content.substring(0,v32-12) }else{ v38 = content.substring(0,12); dest = content.substring(12,content.length); } let key = java.md5Encode(v43+v38).substring(0,8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).substring(0,8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String(key), String(iv)).decryptStr(dest); return content } if(/jjwxc/.test(baseUrl)){ intro=String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g,''); /"content"/.test(result)?java.setContent(result):java.setContent(decode()); intro=intro!=""?"â—"+intro+"â—
":""; content=java.getString("$..content"); saybody=java.getString("$..sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\nã€ğŸ“¢ä½œè€…æœ‰è¯è¯´ã€‘\n"+saybody:""; if(/token/.test(baseUrl)){ vipc=String(content).length > 30?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):java.getString("$..message")+"\nç™»å½•åè¯·æ›´æ–°ç›®å½•ï¼Œåˆ·æ–°æ­£æ–‡"; result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{ result=intro+content+say } }else{ result="" } //è¯„è®ºå¼€å¯ let bbb = book.getVariable("custom") let sss=source.getVariable() if(/è¯„è®º/.test(bbb) || /è¯„è®º/.test(sss)){ let commentNum =/è¯„è®º/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/è¯„è®º(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/è¯„è®º(\d+)/)[1]; if(/chapterContent/.test(baseUrl)){ commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; }else if(/androidChapterBatchDownload/.test(baseUrl)){ body = baseUrl.match(/body":"(.*?)"/)[1]; commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?"+body+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0&commentSort=0" } comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); cflag = comment.code == "200" ? true:false; ccflag = comment.code == undefined ? true:false commentList = []; if(cflag || ccflag){ commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList ||[]; commentb = ""; }else{ commentb = comment.message } for(i=0;i ##ä¸ºè¥é€ æ›´å¥½çš„è¯„è®ºç¯å¢ƒï¼Œè¿‘æœŸç½‘ç«™è¦æ±‚å‘è¯„é¡»è¿›è¡Œå®åè®¤è¯ï¼Œæœªå®åç”¨æˆ·è¯„è®ºæš‚æ—¶ä»…åœ¨å¯¹åº”ä½œè€…åå°åŠå‘è¯„ç”¨æˆ·åå°å¯è§.*|è·å–æ­£æ–‡å¤±è´¥[\s\S]+|â—\s+?â—

@js:
con=`{{@@#author_say@html}}`
iv=src.match(/iv":"(.+?)"/)[1]
key=java.hexDecodeToByteArray('a15e2a7afc8c34a526efb8c6495e7b26')
	iv=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(iv)
	enc=src.match(/enc":"(.+?)"/)[1]
	enc=java.base64DecodeToByteArray(enc)
	c=java.createSymmetricCrypto('AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding',key, iv)
	b=c.decryptStr(enc)
b+con

<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//æ¡ä»¶åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨ä¸ä¸ºç©ºå’Œ0ï¼Œä¸”å°äºé•¿åº¦
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//è¿”å›åˆ—è¡¨
return m
}
//å½“å‰urlåŒ…å«jsonä¸ºå‘ç°ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›ç»“æœ
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//ä¸åŒ…å«jsonä¸ºæœç´¢ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œæœç´¢åŠ è½½
m
</js>

bookUrl = String(java.getRedirectUrl())

let toc = java.getString('.more-btn@href');if(toc==''){let read = String(java.getString('.btn.0@href')).replace(/https?:\/\/.*?(?=\/)/).split('/');let len=read.length;if(len>3){if(/\d$/.test(read)){toc = bookUrl.replace(/\.[^\/]*$/,'/')}else{let tp=read[len-1].match(/\.[^.\/]+$/);java.put('path', '/'+read[1]+'/');java.put('tp', tp?tp[0]:'');toc = String(bookUrl).replace(/.html?$/,'.json')}}else{toc = read.join('/')}}java.put('toc',toc);tags=src.match(/tags\s*:\s*['"](.*)['"]/);if(tags&&tags[1]!='')java.put('tags','ğŸ· æ ‡ç­¾ï¼š'+tags[1].replace(/\|$/,'')+'\nğŸ“œ ç®€ä»‹ï¼š');result
